snippet.title: Sierra Ops - Game Trailer (Concept phase)
snippet.description:
Sierra Ops Episode 1: Collapsing Daybreak is available on Steam for free!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/364210/Sierra_Ops/

Old Game Summary:

A militarized regime rises in Mars to take control of humanity's rule over the solar system. 

A relentless attack leaves the United Terran Vanguard demoralized and scattered as the Ares Confederacy space fleet slowly parades towards Earth to blockade it from orbit. 

You, Junius Fahrenheit, stand as one of the last defenders against a coming storm and humanity's first home. 

Are you ready to take command of Earth's prototype ship, Sierra, and end this war? 


Links:

Visit http://www.innomenpro.com for more information about the story, gameplay and characters.


Characters and Voice actors present in the trailer:

Captain Junius Fahrenheit - Christopher Escalante
http://escalantemusic.com/

Ensign Claine de Lune - Sydney P
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pTGamKPMqRM

Major Jean Brookes - Annie Quinn
http://aikiku.wix.com/varesume

????? - Tina Kim
http://www.youtube.com/user/pickle131vaa/videos

Masked Person - Daniel Hodge
http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCH_7PM6y_DibgzOR9o_A3tA
